title: Glittering Horizon Hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

This series is an experimental narrative in progress. Anyone may contribute. It may take many forms but will follow a distinct storyline. It will concern a murder, the aftermath, the Photography Division, the Church of the Second Hytoth, alternate universes, the mysterious Director Van Turner, and much more.
